answers.answer: Ohh yess that one too haha  anything spicy i cravee..
I was the same way with my first and ice I think my doc said it was due,to low sodium levels, not enough salt. I'd get a big glass full and crunch away lol
I used to eat ice like crazy too but then I found out that my iron was terribly low so I had to quit. :(
Craving ice is a sign you have low iron and are anemic. Ask your doctor about an iron supplement!
Hot Funyuns with either ice cold water or strawberry lemonade
Mine has been salt and ice really bad. I eat ice ALL the time now and I shower my food in salt. Its so wierd.
Ive actually been tested for anemia but thank god my iron always comes out good... Its just that i get alot of hotflashes & then real dizzy so probably its just that y i crave ice soo much..
Oreos. Theyre going to make me fat if I dont stop eating them!!! Lol
I love ice and tangy stuff like sour candy but I need to quit eating so much ice but I love it so much!!
Weird I know but green apples with beer salt on them
I crave ice too.  I hate drinking water so it's the only way I really get water into my diet.  I like the crunch of ice on my teeth.

If you are craving ice, you should mention that to your doctor.  That's CAN (not always) be a sign of low iron/anemia.  So, that is one to let your doctor know so they can check your iron levels and make sure they are adequate.  good luck

I just got my iron level checked last week when I did my gestational diabetes test,  it came back normal. The doctor said it's probably a good thing I crave ice since water isn't my drink of choice lol

Like I said, if you crave ice it could be nothing but women still need to tell their doctors because for many, craving ice in pregnancy is an indication of low iron levels.  Better to know and handle it than to not.  Glad your levels are normal.  good luck

question: me its ICE,ICE,ICE!!! I just cant stop :'( & dont want to eat alot because i get sick very quick! What is ur biggest craving!?
title: What do you Crave the MOST??
